apple_vendor_description: This intimate emoji on Apple devices showcases two figures, a man and a person, sharing a tender kiss with beautifully rendered medium-dark and light skin tones. Apple's signature glossy shading and soft rounded edges give the figures a gentle, affectionate appearance, with subtle highlights emphasizing their connection. It's a heartfelt way to express love, romance, or deep affection between partners on Apple devices, adding a touch of warmth to personal messages.
